DisplayString.Name: Windows Server Operating System Reports
DisplayString.Description: This management pack defines reports used for analyzing data related to Microsoft Windows Servers and the Microsoft Windows Server Operating System.

DisplayString.Name: Performance By System
DisplayString.Description: Provides summarized data about performace of the key system components such as processor, memory, logical disks and network adapters.

DisplayString.Name: Microsoft Windows Server Reports Performance By System Script
DisplayString.Description: SQL Script that deploys necessary for the "Performance By System" report database objects.

DisplayString.Name: Performance By Utilization
DisplayString.Description: This report shows summarized utilization data of different components running under Microsoft Windows Server operating system.

DisplayString.Name: Microsoft Windows Server Reports Performance By Utilization Script
DisplayString.Description: SQL Script that deploys necessary for the "Performance By Utilization" report database objects.

DisplayString.Name: Windows Server 操作系统报表
DisplayString.Description: 此管理包定义用于分析 Microsoft Windows Server 和 Microsoft Windows Server 操作系统相关数据的报表。

DisplayString.Name: Windows Server 作業系統報表
DisplayString.Description: 此管理組件定義用來分析 Microsoft Windows Server 和 Microsoft Windows Server 作業系統相關資料的報告。

DisplayString.Name: Sestav operačního systému Windows Server
DisplayString.Description: Tato sada Management Pack definuje sestavy používané k analýze dat souvisejících s operačními systémy Microsoft Windows Server.

DisplayString.Name: Berichte des Betriebssystems Windows Server
DisplayString.Description: Mit diesem Management Pack werden Berichte definiert, die zur Analyse von Daten im Zusammenhang mit Microsoft Windows-Servern und dem Microsoft Windows Server-Betriebssystem verwendet werden.

DisplayString.Name: Informes del sistema operativo Windows Server
DisplayString.Description: Este módulo de administración define los informes que se utilizan para analizar los datos relacionados con los servidores Microsoft Windows Server y el sistema operativo Microsoft Windows Server.

DisplayString.Name: Rapports du système d'exploitation Windows Server
DisplayString.Description: Ce pack d'administration définit les rapports utilisés pour l'analyse des données relatives aux serveurs Microsoft Windows et au système d'exploitation Microsoft Windows Server.

DisplayString.Name: A Windows Server operációs rendszerrel kapcsolatos jelentések
DisplayString.Description: Ez a felügyeleti csomag a Microsoft Windows kiszolgálókkal és a Microsoft Windows Server operációs rendszerrel kapcsolatos adatok elemzésére használható jelentéseket tartalmazza.

DisplayString.Name: Report del sistema operativo Windows Server
DisplayString.Description: Questo Management Pack definisce i report usati per l'analisi dei dati relativi ai server Microsoft Windows e al sistema operativo Microsoft Windows Server.

DisplayString.Name: Windows Server オペレーティング システム レポート
DisplayString.Description: この管理パックは、Microsoft Windows Server と Microsoft Windows Server オペレーティング システムに関連するデータの分析に使用するレポートを定義します。

DisplayString.Name: Windows Server 운영 체제 보고서
DisplayString.Description: 이 관리 팩은 Microsoft Windows Server 및 Microsoft Windows Server 운영 체제와 관련된 데이터를 분석하는 데 사용되는 보고서를 정의합니다.

DisplayString.Name: Rapporten van Windows Server-besturingssysteem
DisplayString.Description: Dit management pack bepaalt de rapporten die worden gebruikt voor de analyse van gegevens die zijn gerelateerd aan Microsoft Windows-servers en het Microsoft Windows Server-besturingssysteem.

DisplayString.Name: Raporty systemu operacyjnego Windows Server
DisplayString.Description: Ten pakiet administracyjny definiuje raporty używane do analizowania danych dotyczących serwerów systemu Microsoft Windows oraz systemu operacyjnego Microsoft Windows Server.

DisplayString.Name: Relatórios do sistema operacional Windows Server
DisplayString.Description: Este pacote de gerenciamento define relatórios utilizados para analisar dados relacionados aos Servidores Microsoft Windows e ao sistema operacional Microsoft Windows Server.

DisplayString.Name: Relatórios do Sistema Operativo Windows Server
DisplayString.Description: Este pacote de gestão define os relatórios utilizados para analisar dados relacionados com Servidores Microsoft Windows e o Sistema Operativo Microsoft Windows Server.

DisplayString.Name: Отчеты операционной системы Windows Server
DisplayString.Description: Этот пакет управления определяет отчеты, используемые для анализа данных, связанных с серверами Microsoft Windows и операционной системой Microsoft Windows Server.

DisplayString.Name: Rapporter för operativsystemet Windows Server
DisplayString.Description: Det här hanteringspaketet definierar rapporter för att analysera data relaterade till Microsoft Windows Server-instanser och Microsoft Windows Server-operativsystemet.

DisplayString.Name: Windows Server İşletim Sistemi Raporları
DisplayString.Description: Bu yönetim paketi, Microsoft Windows Sunucuları ve Microsoft Windows Server İşletim Sistemi'yle ilişkili verilerin çözümlemesinde kullanılan raporları tanımlar.
